topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54cee99a6368723686c20800#post_54cee99a6368723686c20800
[bq="SquiggyBomb"]Does anyone here even know what the Walmart game is?[/bq]
For those of you wondering what Squiggy is talking about you have $20 and you have to freak the cashier out as much as possible with only 3 items.

Here's good combos for the walmart game:
A rag, duct tape, axe.
I would not do the fertilizer thing cause you'll get the cops called on you.
Bananas, condoms, diapers.
Candle, matches, a belt.
